page.title: 17CROY HOUSING
page.content: Long ago in Croy there were only farmhouses and cottages.Today there are mostly council houses.There are two housing schemes one at DalCroy Road and the other at ArdCroy Road.ArdCroy Road is the bigger with central heated houses.There are not many old people living there because in the winter the electricity sometimes goes off and as there is no heating they could get hypothermia and die.They prefer the coal fire houses at DalCroy where I live.All we have is a good log fire to keep the house warm and it is cheaper than central heating.I prefer DalCroy Road because there are not many cars going up and down making a noise.
